org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode

Class DataXceiverServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.DataXceiverServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

     class DataXceiverServer
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Server used for receiving/sending a block of data. This is created to listen for requests from clients or other DataNodes. This small server does not use the Hadoop IPC mechanism.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  DataXceiverServer.BlockBalanceThrottler
      A manager to make sure that cluster balancing does not take too much resources.

      • closed

        private boolean closed

      • maxXceiverCount

        int maxXceiverCount
        Maximal number of concurrent xceivers per node. Enforcing the limit is required in order to avoid data-node running out of memory.

      • balanceThrottler

        final DataXceiverServer.BlockBalanceThrottler balanceThrottler

      • estimateBlockSize

        final long estimateBlockSize
        We need an estimate for block size to check if the disk partition has enough space. Newer clients pass the expected block size to the DataNode. For older clients we just use the server-side default block size.
